seo.homeDescription: We offer formation services in the United States, bookkeeping services, and ITIN assistance. Contact us to help you establish your business correctly, whether you are inside or outside the United States.
seo.servicesDescription: At Zumia Solutions, we provide comprehensive services and solutions for taxes, business formation, and government procedures in the United States.
seo.aboutUsDescription: At Zumia Solutions, we specialize in tax solutions, business formation, and procedures with U.S. government entities. Our commitment is to provide professional and personalized service to meet all your business needs.
seo.contactDescription: Contact us for tax solutions, business formation, and government procedures in the United States. We are here to support your business and tax needs. Your success is our priority.
seo.privacyDescription: When you visit Zumia Solutions, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies installed on your device.
seo.termsDescription: By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue using Zumia Solutions if you do not agree with all the terms and conditions stated on this page.

home.main: Fiscal and Business Solutions in the United States
home.text1: We guide you through the complete process of forming and registering your business in the United States.
home.text2: We keep your financial records organized and up to date to support clear business decisions.
home.text3: We manage required annual filings and compliance to keep your business in good standing.
home.text4: We prepare and file accurate federal and state tax returns for individuals and businesses.
home.text5: We help you register, file, and manage sales tax obligations correctly and on time.
home.text6: We handle payroll and contractor reporting to ensure accurate and timely compliance.

about.h1: Your Strategic Partner for Growing Your Business
about.h31: Our team of experts provides personalized support to ensure each process is completed efficiently and on time.
about.h32: At Zumia Solutions, we provide comprehensive solutions for taxes, business formation, and compliance in the United States.
about.h33: We are committed to delivering reliable service and clear guidance, so you can move forward with confidence and peace of mind.
about.h34: We support entrepreneurs with clear tax, accounting, and compliance solutions, handling every step efficiently so you can focus on growth.
about.h35: To be a trusted partner at every stage of your business, providing practical solutions that keep you compliant without complications.
about.h36: We are a family-owned company, with over 10 years of experience in accounting and business compliance in the U.S.
about.h37: We work closely with our clients to build long-term relationships based on trust, transparency, and personalized support.

contact.main: Contact Us. Request more information and lets work together
contact.invitation: Ask for Help or Schedule your Consultation
contact.ubih31: We’re located in Orlando, Florida, providing comprehensive tax, accounting, and state filing services to support our clients at every stage of their business.
contact.ubih34: Follow the map below or <1>click here</1>.

terms.p1: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of the Zumia Solutions website and services. By accessing this website or submitting a request for services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use this website.
terms.p2: Zumia Solutions is a Florida-registered company located at 2875 S Orange Ave, Orlando, FL 32806, United States. You may contact us at info@zumiasolutions.xyz or +1 (917) 915-6583.
terms.p3: Zumia Solutions provides administrative, compliance, accounting, and tax-related support services for businesses and entrepreneurs. We are not a law firm or a CPA firm, and our services do not constitute legal or financial advice. Final decisions and filings remain the responsibility of the client.
terms.p4: While we strive to achieve the best possible outcomes, results depend on third-party agencies such as the IRS, state authorities, and other institutions. Zumia Solutions cannot guarantee approvals, processing times, or outcomes beyond what these entities allow.
terms.p5: Clients are responsible for providing accurate, complete, and timely information. Delays or errors resulting from incorrect or late information may affect service outcomes. Zumia Solutions is not liable for such delays or inaccuracies.
terms.p6: Our services are available to both U.S. and international clients. International clients are responsible for complying with all applicable laws in their country of residence.
terms.p7: Liability, if any, will be assessed on a case-by-case basis. Zumia Solutions shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services or website.
terms.p8: In the event of a dispute, both parties agree to attempt resolution through mediation before pursuing any other legal remedies.
terms.p9: Content on this website as all texts, brand logos, and design elements, are property of Zumia Solutions and may not be used without prior written consent. Supporting images have free use permission

privacy.p1: Zumia Solutions respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard data when you use our website.
privacy.p2: We collect personal information only when you voluntarily submit it through our contact form. This includes your name, email address, and message content.
privacy.p3: Submitted information is used solely to respond to inquiries, provide consultations, and deliver requested services. Data may be processed internally and through Google Apps Script and Gmail for communication purposes.
privacy.p4: Contact form submissions are stored in a private internal database accessible only to Zumia Solutions. We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.p5: Our website includes third-party services such as Google Maps, Instagram embeds, WhatsApp links, Facebook links, and Gmail compose links. These services may collect device, usage, or IP data according to their own privacy policies.
privacy.p6: Zumia Solutions does not set first-party cookies. Language preferences are stored locally in your browser using localStorage. Third-party embeds may set their own cookies beyond our control.
privacy.p7: You have the right to request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data. Requests can be made by contacting us at info@zumiasolutions.xyz.
privacy.p8: We implement reasonable administrative and technical safeguards to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.
